page.title: 12VEGETATION
page.content: The main vegetation types in the study area include semi-natural deciduous woodland, forestry plantation, acid and neutral grassland, aquatic and marsh vegetation. The climax vegetation is oak woodland . Deciduous woodland in the area has much sycamore and beech although neither are native trees here. More than 400 species of flowering plants have been recorded in the area . In the deciduous woodland herbs such as celandine,yellow archangel, wood sorrel, wood anemone, broad leaved wiilow herb and bluebell are conspicuous in spring.In autumn these same woods have toadstools such as Boletus, Russula, Amanita, Lactarius,Inocybe,Mycena and Tricholoma.Familiar flowers of hedges and waysides include dandelion,daisy, red campion,stitchwort,herb robert, hogweed,foxglove,violet and plantains.
